relationships.description: Long-term association spanning 16 years, with sender having worked for Jeffrey E. and following his advice
GM provided career advice to sender along with Jeffrey E.

analysis.purpose: To express distress about media attention and request help relocating to avoid publicity related to association with Jeffrey E.
analysis.significance: Reveals negative personal consequences for someone associated with Jeffrey E. during media scrutiny of high-profile figures

notable_quotes: I have been your supporter for 16 years, the media explosion with Clinton, Trump and Cosby is affecting me. I'm not prepared for this.
I dropped out of college because of you (and GM's) advice. Started working for a company you wanted me to and basically my life has become hell since then.
I can not have press, media, private investigators, film companies, etc. contacting me or my parents and sisters at home or on cell/texts and or by mail.
red_flags: Sender claims life has been negatively impacted by association with Jeffrey E.
References to avoiding media and investigators
Mentions losing relationships and career opportunities due to the association
Financial struggles attributed to following Jeffrey E.'s advice

evidence: Implied responsibility for sender's negative life outcomes
blackmail_indicators.description: Sender appears to be holding Jeffrey E. responsible for their negative life circumstances and is demanding assistance, though not explicitly threatening

illegal_activity.description: No direct evidence of illegal activity in this communication - it's a personal complaint about media attention and life consequences

details: References to press, media, private investigators, film companies trying to contact sender
Mentions media explosion involving Clinton, Trump, and Cosby

public_knowledge.context: This appears to be a private communication from someone affected by media coverage of high-profile figures in 2016, particularly during election cycle and Cosby scandal

analysis.summary: A distressed individual emails Jeffrey Epstein expressing desperation about media attention affecting their life, claiming their association with Epstein has caused personal and professional harm, and requesting help to relocate to avoid further contact from press and investigators.
